text: A riffle is a shallow landform in a flowing channel. Riffle may also refer to: *Riffle, Illinois, United States, an unincorporated community *Riffle, West Virginia, United States, an unincorporated community *Riffle (anonymity network) *Shuffling § Riffle, a shuffling technique in cards *Charley Riffle (1918–2002), American football player (guard for Notre Dame) *Dick Riffle (1915–1981), American football player (running back for the Philadelphia Eagles and the Pittsburgh Steelers) ==See also== *Rifle (disambiguation) *Ripple (disambiguation)
title: Riffle (disambiguation)
